title: [Malcolm : publicity kit]
brief_description: Publicity kit for the production Malcolm (1986), including 6 B&W Stills (Large), 12 35mm Colour Transparencies, 5 Press Kit/ Reviews, 2 B&W Negatives, 1 Colour Negative Strip, 1 Cast and crew list
